comments:
A JPA project with 2 java classes defined:

@MappedSuperclass
public class NamedEntity {
   private String name;
}

@Entity
public class Pet {
}


Make the Pet java class extend NamedEntity and you get the following exception.  I haven't looked to closely but it appears that the default attribute override is added to the Entity.defaultAttributeOverrides collection and subsequently removed(not supposed to happen) which is causing the odd NPE.
